description: This file defines the PracticeScreen widget for a Flutter app. It provides an interactive quiz interface with progress tracking, scoring, and navigation controls, utilizing provider for state management.

classes.name: PracticeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a quiz practice screen with progress bar, score display, and navigation controls.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the practice screen, including progress indicator, quiz question, and navigation buttons.
